name: 2024 8th International Conference on Natural Language Processing and Information Retrieval
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be checked plagiarism, including self-plagiarism firstly by Cross-Check and then submitted to the TPC for further review. After several rounds of rigorous review, accepted and presented papers will be published in NLPIR 2024 International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1738-3), which will be submitted for Ei Compendex, Scopus indexing, etc.
